page.title: 17A Shopping Basket
page.content: A=large supermarket B=small grocery chain ITEM COST(A) COST(B) Bread(large white) 46p 54p Milk(1 pint) 22p 23p 6eggs(size 3) 44p 45p 3lb.S.R.flour 43p 45p !kg.sugar 46p 48p 1/2 lb butter 48p 51p 1/2 lb streaky bacon 66p 57p 1 lb cheddar cheeseÂ£1.09 Â£1.15 1 lb pork sausages 85p 99p 1 packet biscuits 34p 39p 1/4 lb tea 49p 52p Packet custard powder 29p 30p 1 lb new potatoes 20p 20p 1 lb spring greens 25p 34p Lettuce 17p 26p 1 lb tomatoes 48p 55p 1 lb English apples 36p 38p This price survey took place in May 1985
